trigger.name: Exchange Transport Queue Length: Active mailbox delivery queue length greater than 250 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Transport Queue Length: Active non-SMTP delivery queue length greater than 250 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Transport Queue Length: Active remote delivery queue length greater than 250 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Transport Queue Length: Delivery queue length (all queues) greater than 3000 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Transport Queue Length: Largest delivery queue length greater than 200 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Transport Queue Length: Poison queue length greater than 0 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Transport Queue Length: Retry mailbox delivery queue length greater than 100 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Transport Queue Length: Retry non-SMTP delivery queue length greater than 100 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Transport Queue Length: Retry remote delivery queue length greater than 100 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Transport Queue Length: Submission queue length greater than 100 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Transport Queue Length: Unreachable queue length greater than 100 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Transport service service not running
